explanation: 该论文主要关注的是循环碳捕获技术，特别是使用废弃物衍生的活性炭作为碳捕获材料。它通过生命周期评估和技术经济评估来比较不同活性炭的性能。虽然碳捕获与大气中的二氧化碳浓度有关，但该研究的重点在于捕获技术本身，而非大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['Carbon Capture', 'Activated Carbon', 'Life Cycle Assessment', 'Techno-economic Assessment', 'Waste-derived materials']
authors: Beomhui Lee and Jiajun He
title: Circular Carbon Capture: Comparative Life Cycle and Techno-Economic Assessment of Waste-Derived Activated Carbons

explanation: 该研究关注的是环境空气污染对患有冠状动脉疾病的患者人体代谢组的影响。虽然涉及空气污染，但重点在于生物医学方面，而非大气环境遥感技术的应用，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Duan Wang;Chang Liu;Yi-An Ko;Howard H. Chang;Zhihao Jin;Youran Tan;Vilinh Tran;Dean P. Jones;Arshed A. Quyyumi;Donghai Liang
title: Effects of Exposure to Ambient Air Pollution on Human Metabolome in Patients with Coronary Artery Disease

explanation: 该研究标题和摘要主要关注下一代新兴PFOA替代品的风险评估，采用综合的新方法。PFOA（全氟辛酸）是一种持久性有机污染物，因此研究重点在于评估替代品的潜在环境和健康风险。虽然该研究可能与环境科学相关，但它似乎不直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该研究更侧重于化学物质的毒理学和风险评估，而不是大气遥感。
authors: You Song;Xueqi Fan;Maria T. Hultman;Maria Christou;Jan Thomas Rundberget;Camden K. Klefbom;Yan Lin;Yangzhao Sun;Jun Huang;Li Xie
title: Next Generation Risk Assessment of Emerging PFOA Alternatives Using Integrated New Approach Methodologies

explanation: 该研究论文关注的是PM2.5引起的死亡率变化，并按不同行业部门进行了分析。虽然摘要中没有直接提及遥感技术，但PM2.5的监测和来源解析通常会用到大气环境遥感技术，例如利用卫星观测来监测PM2.5的浓度分布，或者通过大气化学传输模型结合排放清单来追踪不同行业部门的贡献。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术具有间接相关性，尤其是在空气质量监测和污染源解析方面。
authors: Bujin Bekbulat;Alper Unal;Arushi Sharma;Joshua S Apte;Julian D. Marshall
title: Changes in PM2.5-Attributable Mortality in the US by Sector, 2002–2019

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了沿海气溶胶颗粒物中半挥发性有机物的浓度差异以及上风向来源的相似性。虽然没有明确提及遥感技术，但其研究内容与大气成分分析和空气质量监测密切相关，因此可以被认为是与大气环境遥感技术相关的。通过分析不同地点的气溶胶成分和来源，可以为遥感数据的验证和解释提供地面参考，并有助于理解大气污染的传输和扩散过程。
topic_words: ['coastal aerosol particles', 'semivolatile organic compounds', 'air quality monitoring', 'upwind sources', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Sanghee Han;Abigail S. Williams;Lynn M. Russell;Veronica Z. Berta;Jeramy L. Dedrick;Christian Pelayo;Nattamon Maneenoi;Atsushi Osawa;Israel Silber;Damao Zhang;Maria A. Zawadowicz;Arthur J. Sedlacek;III
title: Nearby Sites Show Similar Upwind Sources and Differing Semivolatile Concentrations in Coastal Aerosol Particles

explanation: 该研究主要关注在潮湿的牲畜环境中选择性捕获氨气，侧重于材料科学和环境工程在农业领域的应用，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联性不大。虽然氨气也是一种大气污染物，但该研究的重点是控制牲畜环境中的氨气浓度，而非利用遥感技术进行大气监测。
authors: Jun Zhang;Li Zhang;Shuai Wang;Jianhui Zhi
title: Hierarchically Porous δ-MnO2 Aerogels for Selective Ammonia Capture in Humid Livestock Environments

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注由地表腐殖质燃烧产生的初级和次级有机气溶胶的光吸收特性演变。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为有机气溶胶是大气中的重要组成部分，影响空气质量和气候。通过研究其光吸收特性，可以提高对大气成分和辐射平衡的理解，并为空气质量监测和卫星观测提供数据支持。该研究的结果可以用于改进大气模型，从而更准确地预测空气质量和气候变化。
topic_words: ['organic aerosol', 'light absorption', 'primary organic aerosol', 'secondary organic aerosol', 'duff burning', 'air quality', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Muhammad I. Abdurrahman;Chase K. Glenn;Robert Penland;Ryan P. Poland;Jonathan H. Choi;Elijah T. Roberts;I. Jonathan Amster;Geoffrey D. Smith;Rawad Saleh
title: Decoupling the Evolution of the Light-Absorption Properties of Primary and Secondary Organic Aerosol Produced from Duff Burning

explanation: 这篇研究论文探讨了火星全球沙尘暴快速衰减的机制，重点在于小尺度沉积过程在行星边界层中的作用。研究利用MarsWRF模型，并引入了细致的、分辨粒径的沙尘微物理沉积方案，该方案考虑了重力沉降之外的多种微物理过程，能够有效去除小尺寸沙尘颗粒。模型成功模拟了沙尘暴期间有效粒子半径的增加以及沙尘暴的快速衰减。研究揭示了太阳辐射、大气稳定性、沙尘扬升和消散以及大气动力学之间存在辐射-动力正反馈循环。这些结果强调了微物理过程在火星行星尺度事件发展中的作用，并强调了在火星大气环流模型中包含小尺度过程的必要性。虽然论文没有直接提及地球大气环境遥感技术，但其研究方法（例如模型模拟、大气成分分析）和关注点（例如大气颗粒物、辐射传输）与大气环境遥感领域密切相关，特别是当涉及到利用卫星观测数据验证模型结果时。因此，可以认为该研究与大气环境遥感技术具有较强的相关性，尤其是关于大气成分（沙尘）的遥感监测和模型验证。
topic_words: ['Martian atmosphere', 'global dust storms', 'dust particle size distribution', 'radiative transfer', 'MarsWRF model', 'microphysical processes', 'atmospheric stability', 'solar insolation', 'dust lifting', 'atmospheric dynamics', 'satellite observations (implied)', 'atmospheric composition (dust)']
authors: Lulu Li;Cong Sun;Claire E. Newman;Siteng Fan;Yongxuan Zhao;Tao Li;Chun Zhao
title: Rapid Decay of Martian Global Dust Storms Driven by Small‐Scale Deposition Processes in the Lower Planetary Boundary Layer
abstract: As one of the iconic features on Mars, global dust storms (GDSs) often decay rapidly. However, general circulation models (GCMs) typically underestimate their decay rates, which is one of the major challenges in simulating the Martian atmosphere. Here, we evaluate the role of a recently implemented size‐resolved microphysical deposition scheme of dust particles in the MarsWRF model on GDS evolution. This scheme includes a series of microphysical processes, in addition to gravitational sedimentation, which facilitates the efficient removal of small dust particles. The model successfully reproduces the observed increase in effective particle radius during dust storms, along with their rapid decay. A radiative‐dynamic positive feedback loop is seen among solar insolation, atmospheric stability, dust lifting and dissipation, and atmospheric dynamics. These results highlight the role of microphysics in the development of planetary‐scale events on Mars, and underscore the need to include small‐scale processes in Mars GCMs.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注2023/2024年冬季中国东部发生的极端天气事件，如寒潮、大雪和冻雨。研究表明，这些极端天气与厄尔尼诺现象有关，厄尔尼诺通过影响北大西洋急流和西太平洋反气旋，分别增强了冷空气的环流和水汽输送，从而导致了极端寒冷潮湿天气的发生。虽然论文涉及大气环流和天气现象，但它并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO)', 'Subseasonal Weather Extremes', 'Siberian High', 'North Atlantic Jet Stream', 'Freezing Rain']
authors: Shuangmei Ma;Congwen Zhu
title: Severe 2023/2024 Winter Subseasonal Weather Extremes Over Eastern China: Two Pathways of ENSO Impacts
abstract: During the 2023/2024 winter, eastern China experienced frequent cold extremes, heavy snowfall, and freezing rain, modulated by the circulation regime of enhanced atmospheric intraseasonal oscillation (ISO). Our results show these severe weather events can be attributed to two pathways of El Niño's influence. The strong ISO cold events were characterized by an amplified Siberian High, developed from a North Atlantic (NA)‐originating Rossby wave train. The El Niño modulated the NA jet stream by strengthening, extending it eastward, and increasing its southwest–northeast tilt, which reinforced cold‐air circulation regime via interactions between the seasonal background flow and ISO perturbations. Meanwhile, El Niño strengthened the western North Pacific anticyclone, enhancing moisture transport for freezing rain formation. The two pathways of El Niño–Southern Oscillation (ENSO) impacts can be found in most ENSO years, implying that ENSO is an important source of subseasonal forecast of extreme cold‐wet events in China.

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究土星磁层与土卫二（Enceladus）之间的电动力相互作用，以及由此产生的低能量电子束。论文分析了卡西尼号飞船在穿过连接土卫二尾迹的磁力线管时对低能量电子的测量数据，探讨了这些电子的性质以及它们与土卫二极光嘶声之间的关系。研究还发现，电子束的特性与引起土卫二紫外足迹的电子束有很大不同。总的来说，这篇论文关注的是行星物理学和空间等离子体物理学，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: J. Rabia;L. Z. Hadid;N. André;Q. Nénon;T. Chust;D. Pisa;A. Parsec‐Wallis;A. J. Coates;A. M. Rymer
title: Cassini CAPS‐ELS Observations of Low‐Energy Electron Beams Within Enceladus Mid‐Latitude Flux Tubes
abstract: The electrodynamic interaction between Saturn's magnetosphere and Enceladus accelerates electrons along magnetic field lines. These electrons propagate inside magnetic flux tubes connecting the moon to the giant planet, generating distinctive auroral hiss and auroral footprint signatures, both previously observed by the Cassini spacecraft. In this study, we analyze low‐energy electron measurements made during multiple mid‐latitude crossings of magnetic flux tubes connected to Enceladus' wake. We show that the properties of the observed electrons are consistent with those of electrons inducing Enceladus' auroral hiss, and discuss the physical processes responsible for their pitch‐angle distributions and acceleration. Field‐aligned electron beams have very different properties from those triggering the Enceladus ultraviolet footprint, with a much lower characteristic energy and energy flux. Observations of electron beams resulting from the moon‐magnetosphere interactions up to 30° downstream of the moon reveal that the coupling system between Enceladus and Saturn is significantly more extended than previously anticipated.

explanation: 该论文主要研究圣海伦斯火山下方的多层管道系统，利用高分辨率地震矩阵成像方法揭示了地壳反射率模型。研究重点在于火山内部的岩浆管道系统、流体/熔体通道以及地质构造，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Jia Wei;Qiancheng Liu;Jie Li;Ling Chen
title: Multilayered Plumbing Beneath Mount St. Helens Revealed From a High‐Resolution Seismic Matrix‐Imaging Method
abstract: Mount St. Helens (MSH) is one of the most active volcanoes in the Cascade Arc and a natural laboratory for subduction‐related volcanism. However, intense subsurface scattering has long hindered high‐resolution seismic imaging of its magma plumbing system. To overcome this challenge, we apply an improved matrix‐imaging method to generate a high‐resolution crustal reflectivity model beneath MSH. The resulting model reveals a multilayered architecture dominated by a laterally extensive reflector that coincides with the top of the Siletz terrane. This horizon likely acts as both a primary accumulation platform and a mechanically sensitive gate. Southeast‐directed reflectors spatially coincide with a mid‐lower‐crust low‐velocity column and delineate potential fluid/melt pathways. Episodic inputs along this corridor may recharge the shallow system. These processes could modulate eruptive style. Overall, our results illuminate candidate subsurface transport pathways, highlight targets for monitoring, and demonstrate the effectiveness of matrix imaging in scattering‐prone volcanic crust.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注岩石在挥发性物质消耗反应过程中的渗透率变化控制因素，利用反应-传输-变形模型和孔隙网络-离散元求解器来研究岩石的压裂、矿化和流体流动对渗透率的影响。重点在于反应产物的形成导致的孔隙堵塞与体积膨胀和压裂导致的孔隙扩张之间的竞争，以及由此产生的稳态。研究结果旨在解释野外和实验室证据中常常出现的对比趋势，并提高地下碳储存的效率。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Hongwei Wu;Giuseppe Buscarnera
title: Unraveling the Controls of Rock Permeability Change During Volatile‐Consuming Reactions
abstract: Permeability changes of rocks are critical in hydration and carbonation, as they significantly affect the subsurface chemical composition. This study uses a one‐dimensional reactive‐transport‐deformation model to define the dimensionless factors controlling permeability in the presence of rock fracturing, mineralization, and fluid flow. Furthermore, a coupled pore network‐discrete element solver is used to validate the proposed parameters by capturing permeability evolution trends observed in the laboratory. Our analyses reveal a competition between pore clogging due to reaction product formation and pore dilation due to volume expansion and fracturing, showing the emergence of steady state in systems characterized by different initial porosity. Notably, two distinct regimes are found, one dominated by clogging and permeability loss, and the other controlled by fracturing, pore expansion, and permeability increase. These findings help rationalize the often contrasting trends resulting from field and laboratory evidence and can be used to enhance the efficiency of subsurface carbon storage.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了热带信风浅积云周围湿度晕的形成及其对向下长波辐射的影响。研究利用巴巴多斯云观测站的数据，包括长波辐射测量和激光雷达的水汽廓线数据，分析了云周围的辐射环境。结果表明，湿度晕导致向下长波辐射平均增加0.68Wm−2，与之前的卫星观测估计一致。研究还探讨了湿度晕的形成原因，认为中尺度组织可能在调节边界层特别是云层高度的水汽方面发挥关键作用，从而导致云周围湿度增加。虽然主要侧重于云和辐射，但它与大气环境遥感技术相关，特别是卫星观测和大气成分分析，因为它使用了遥感数据（激光雷达）来研究大气中的水汽分布，并与卫星观测结果进行了比较，并讨论了云对辐射的影响。
topic_words: ['longwave radiation', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric moisture', 'humidity profiles', 'cloud radiative effects']
authors: Marius Rixen;Julia Windmiller;Bjorn Stevens
title: Influence of Mesoscale Organization on the Formation of Humidity Haloes
abstract: Humidity haloes‐regions of enhanced water vapor surrounding trade wind shallow cumulus clouds‐can significantly influence downward longwave radiation due to their elevated moisture content compared to clear‐sky conditions. Using data from the Barbados Cloud Observatory—including longwave radiation measurements and moisture profiles from the co‐located CORAL LiDAR instrument—we analyze the radiative environment around clouds. After observing such humidity haloes up to a distance of 9km $9\,\mathrm{k}\mathrm{m}$ from shallow cumulus clouds, we find an average increase in downward longwave radiation due to haloes of 0.68Wm−2 $0.68{\mathrm{W}\,\mathrm{m}}^{-2}$, which is consistent with previous satellite based observational estimates. The cause of halo formation is also examined. A rough mass flux estimate suggests detrainment from a single cloud alone can't explain their formation. Our results suggest that mesoscale organization likely plays a key role in modulating moisture in the boundary layer and especially at cloud level, thus contributing to increasing humidity around clouds.

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是多孔介质中的地下水流建模，而非大气环境遥感技术。它利用生成式学习框架，结合概率扩散模型、观测数据和领域知识，对地下水流进行随机建模。论文重点在于如何利用预训练的扩散模型捕捉动态系统的先验信息，并结合贝叶斯条件采样和无训练知识对齐策略，以提高地下水流建模的准确性和效率。虽然该研究涉及数据建模和不确定性量化，但其应用领域是地下水流，与大气环境遥感（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Zhongzheng Wang;Yuntian Chen;Nanzhe Wang;Guodong Chen;Dongxiao Zhang
title: Generative Subsurface Flow Modeling With Pretrained Diffusion Model and Training‐Free Knowledge Alignment
abstract: We introduce a versatile generative learning framework that integrates probabilistic diffusion models, observational data, and domain knowledge for stochastic modeling of flow in porous media. The framework begins by pretraining an unconditional diffusion model to approximate the joint distribution of subsurface parameters and state variables, effectively capturing prior information of dynamical systems. By leveraging Bayesian conditional sampling, the model flexibly incorporates specific constraints and adapts to multiple modeling tasks without retraining or fine‐tuning. Furthermore, we devise a training‐free knowledge alignment strategy that embeds domain‐specific knowledge into the sampling process to generate spatiotemporal fields more compatible with physical principles. Extensive evaluations on diverse subsurface flow problems demonstrate that a single pretrained diffusion model, equipped with optimized generative paths, delivers superior performance in unconditional generation, forward prediction, uncertainty quantification, and inverse modeling with sparse and noisy data. These findings underscore the potential of knowledge‐aligned generative learning to advance subsurface flow modeling research.

explanation: 这篇论文主要关注海洋对全球变暖的缓冲作用，特别是中尺度涡旋对海洋热吸收（OHU）的影响。研究发现，在全球变暖的背景下，中尺度涡旋垂直热传输（EVHT）减弱，导致异常的向下热传输，从而促进海洋吸收大气中的热量并将其储存在深海中。数值实验表明，人为的EVHT变化可能在21世纪末对OHU贡献约20%。该研究主要关注海洋动力学和气候变化，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Man Yuan;Zhao Jing;Hong Wang;Shengpeng Wang;Lixin Wu
title: Enhanced Ocean Heat Uptake by Mesoscale Eddies in a Community Earth System Model
abstract: The ocean acts as a major buffer of global warming by absorbing approximately 90% of heat surplus over the past half century. An in‐depth knowledge of dynamical processes underpinning the ocean heat uptake (OHU) is crucial for accurately projecting anthropogenic climate changes. Mesoscale eddies contribute importantly to heat transport in the ocean, but their effects on the OHU remain poorly understood. Based on a high‐resolution climate simulation from a community earth system model, we find that mesoscale eddy vertical heat transport (EVHT), upward at the climatological mean state, is projected to weaken under global warming. This corresponds to an anomalous downward heat transport, facilitating the ocean absorption of heat surplus from the atmosphere and its storage in the deep ocean. Numerical sensitivity experiments suggest that the anthropogenic EVHT change could contribute to about 20% of the OHU by the end of the 21st century under a high carbon emission scenario.

explanation: 该论文主要研究大陆风化过程中硅酸盐的溶解，特别是粘土矿物的溶解，以及这种溶解对海洋沉积物中锂同位素比率的影响。研究重点在于通过分析海洋沉积物中的锂同位素来推断过去地质时期粘土矿物的溶解情况，并探讨气候条件（如温暖时期）对这一过程的影响。虽然该研究涉及地球化学循环和气候变化，但它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。因此，该论文不属于大气环境遥感技术的范畴。
authors: Zhewen Xu;Ruoshui Wang;Lianwen Liu;Jingxian Li;Junfeng Ji;Jun Chen;Gaojun Li
title: Congruent Weathering of Continental Silicates During Warm Periods: Evidence From Lithium Isotopes in Marine Sediments
abstract: Dissolution of secondary clay minerals during continental weathering (hereafter clay dissolution) has been proposed as a mechanism to explain some of the low seawater lithium isotopic ratios (δ7Li) observed in the geologic past. However, direct evidence for clay dissolution on Earth surface remains limited, and the controlling factors are poorly understood. Here, we suggest that δ7Li of fine sediments can serve as a proxy for clay dissolution. We analyzed δ7Li of the sediments from the Ocean Drilling Program site 1148, and developed a stoichiometric model to disentangle the respective contributions of source rock fragments and marine authigenic aluminosilicate clays to the sediment Li budget. Our results reveal low δ7Li in continentally formed clays during the warm interval of 23–15 Ma, followed by a progressive increase during 15–5 Ma, coinciding with global cooling. We suggest that warm and tectonically stable conditions might have promoted clay dissolution on continents.

explanation: 这篇论文主要介绍了一种高效的电解剥离方法，用于制备12英寸晶圆级独立式铁电氧化物薄膜。该方法利用LaNiO3牺牲层，通过电场增强的吸附能和电子转移，将氧化物薄膜的释放速率提高到600 mm2/min。该技术旨在解决柔性器件和半导体集成中，易碎薄膜的剥离问题，并成功制备出大尺寸的PbZrO3薄膜，用于柔性压电传感器阵列。该论文关注的是材料科学和半导体制造领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Hangren Li;Jie Tu;Siyuan Du;Guoqiang Xi;Chen Liu;Yue-Wen Fang;Shuai Xu;Jia-Han Zhang;Enqi Sun;Shunli Ouyang;Xudong Liu;Longyuan Shi;Xiuqiao Liu;Dongxing Zheng;Lei Guo;Xixiang Zhang;Kuijuan Jin;Jianjun Tian;Linxing Zhang;Xianran Xing
title: Efficient electrodynamic stripping for 12-inch wafer-scale freestanding ferroelectric oxide membranes
abstract:
A directional electrodynamic decomposition method using a LaNiO3 sacrificial layer is proposed for freestanding films. It boosts oxide film release rate to 600 mm2 /min via electric field-enhanced adsorption energy and electron transfer. 
 Developing an efficient and non-destructive stripping method suitable for most fragile freestanding films is essential for developing industrial semiconductor integration and flexible devices. Here, we propose a rapid stripping process of directional electrodynamic decomposition based on the conductive LaNiO3 sacrificial layer, which can effectively overcome the surface tension during solution penetration. Notably, the release rate of oxide films can be increased to 600 mm2/min, which is two orders of magnitude more than that of traditional soaking method, ascribed to the improvement of the adsorption energy and electron transfer by the electric field. The electrodynamic stripping efficiency is not limited by thickness and area size of sacrificial layers and enables non-destructive and scalable fabrication of freestanding films. The crack-free 3-inch freestanding PbZrO3 epitaxial membrane represents the largest ferroelectric-based membrane achieved to date, which enables its direct integration into flexible piezoelectric sensor array. Intriguingly, a record-breaking 12-inch polycrystalline membrane has been developed to address the requirements of industrial-scale semiconductor manufacturing. The strain-relaxed PbZrO3 membranes exhibit the hysteresis loop of the antiferroelectric transition to ferroelectric. This electrodynamic approach with conductive sacrificial layer will greatly improve the stripping efficiency of high-quality functional freestanding membranes, thereby promoting their application in wafer-level electronic devices. A directional electrodynamic decomposition method using a LaNiO3 sacrificial layer is proposed for freestanding films. It boosts oxide film release rate to 600 mm2 /min via electric field-enhanced adsorption energy and electron transfer.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注阿尔茨海默病（AD）的血液生物标志物，以及这些标志物在不同认知衰退阶段与疾病进展的关系。研究重点在于利用血液生物标志物（如p-tau217, p-tau181, NfL, GFAP等）来预测和评估轻度认知障碍（MCI）向痴呆症发展的风险。论文内容与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Martina Valletta;Davide Liborio Vetrano;Caterina Gregorio;Debora Rizzuto;Bengt Winblad;Marco Canevelli;Sarah Andersson;Matilda Dale;Claudia Fredolini;Erika J. Laukka;Laura Fratiglioni;Giulia Grande
title: Blood biomarkers of Alzheimer’s disease and progression across different stages of cognitive decline in the community
abstract:
Blood biomarkers of Alzheimer’s disease, including p-tau217, are linked with faster progression from mild cognitive impairment to dementia, supporting their potential for risk stratification at the stage of mild cognitive impairment in the community. 
 Blood biomarkers of Alzheimer’s disease (AD) are promising for dementia prediction, but their association with progression across intermediate stages of cognitive decline in the general population remains unclear. We followed 2148 dementia-free individuals from a Swedish population-based cohort for up to 16 years. Associations between baseline AD blood biomarkers and transitions between normal cognition, mild cognitive impairment (MCI), and dementia were examined. Lower amyloid-β42/40 ratio and higher phosphorylated-tau181 (p-tau181), p-tau217, total-tau, neurofilament light chain (NfL), and glial fibrillary acidic protein (GFAP) were associated with faster progression from MCI to all-cause and AD dementia, with the strongest associations for NfL and p-tau217. Elevated NfL and GFAP were linked to reduced MCI reversion to normal cognition, whereas no biomarker was associated with MCI development from normal cognition. These findings show robust group-level associations and indicate that AD blood biomarkers may help stratify dementia risk at the MCI stage in the community. Blood biomarkers of Alzheimer’s disease, including p-tau217, are linked with faster progression from mild cognitive impairment to dementia, supporting their potential for risk stratification at the stage of mild cognitive impairment in the community.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注的是噬菌体 D3 衣壳的结构，特别是衣壳蛋白的组装机制以及如何控制衣壳的大小。研究通过分子层面的可视化技术，揭示了衣壳蛋白的结构特征以及一个关键的结构基序，该基序在调节衣壳大小方面起着重要作用。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，因为它主要关注的是病毒的结构生物学。
authors: Anna K. Belford;Joshua B. Maurer;Robert L. Duda;Alexis Huet;James F. Conway
title: Structural insights into scaffold-guided assembly of the Pseudomonas phage D3 capsid
abstract:
Tailed bacteriophages package their DNA into symmetric protein shells, called “capsids”, that use a common subunit fold. Here, authors visualize such a capsid at the molecular level and identify a key structural motif involved in regulating its size. 
 Tailed bacteriophages comprise the largest structural family of viruses with close relatives in archaea and the eukaryotic herpesviruses. The common assembly pathway produces an icosahedrally symmetric protein shell, called capsid, into which the double-stranded DNA genome is packaged. While capsid sizes and amino acid sequences vary considerably, the major capsid protein (MCP) folds are remarkably similar throughout the family. To investigate the mechanisms governing capsid size, we characterize the procapsid and mature capsid of phage D3, which expresses an icosahedral lattice with Triangulation number T = 9. We find that the MCP scaffold domain binds to the interior capsid surface, acting as a clamp to constrain subunit interactions. Following scaffold digestion, the MCP capsid domains form strong interactions that maintain capsid structure throughout maturation. The scaffold constraints appear critical for capsid size determination and provide important understanding of the factors governing capsid assembly in general and expands our understanding of these ecologically and biomedically important viruses. Tailed bacteriophages package their DNA into symmetric protein shells, called “capsids”, that use a common subunit fold. Here, authors visualize such a capsid at the molecular level and identify a key structural motif involved in regulating its size.

explanation: 该研究主要关注巴西亚马逊地区极端气候事件（洪水、干旱、热浪、火灾、滑坡）对当地居民，特别是原住民和传统社区的影响，以及由此造成的经济和社会损失。研究强调气候变化如何加剧贫困，并呼吁采取以公正为中心的适应政策干预措施。虽然提到了火灾，但重点在于灾害的社会经济影响和气候正义，而不是大气环境遥感技术本身，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Patrícia F. Pinho;Rafaella Silvestrini;Martha Fellows;Letícia Perez;Ane Alencar;Carolina Guyot;Paulo Moutinho;David Lapola;Lindsay Stringer
title: “Vulnerabilities and compound risks of escalating climate disasters in the Brazilian Amazon”
abstract:
This study shows how escalating floods, droughts, heatwaves, fires, and landslides in the Amazon create unequal risks for Indigenous and traditional communities, urging climate justice in the world’s largest tropical forest. 
 The Brazilian Amazon is severely impacted by extreme climate events, with 1.8 million people (6.4% of the Brazilian Amazon’s population) affected by climate-related disasters each year between 2018 and 2022. Yet, how climate disasters specifically affect human populations in different municipalities in the Amazon is underexplored. We target this gap, presenting a region-wide spatiotemporal assessment of climate-related disasters and social vulnerability across the Brazilian Amazon over the period 2000–2022, considering floods, droughts, heatwaves, fires, and landslides, and using a compound risk lens. Analysis of secondary data shows disaster frequency surged, with wet events rising fivefold, fires tenfold, and droughts and heatwaves tripling. Economic losses rose 370% reaching USD 634.2 million annually, with wet events most damaging. Farming sustained over 60% of total losses, followed by infrastructure, housing, and health services. Smaller municipalities, which host 61% of the region’s Indigenous population, experienced the highest relative impacts, including a 9.58% loss in economic growth and lower Social Progress Index scores. Data on non-economic losses and damages were lacking, but further exacerbated the impacts in these vulnerable areas. Findings underscore that climate change is a poverty multiplier, and highlight the urgent need for adaptation policy interventions to be justice-centered. This study shows how escalating floods, droughts, heatwaves, fires, and landslides in the Amazon create unequal risks for Indigenous and traditional communities, urging climate justice in the world’s largest tropical forest.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注的是陆地生态系统的蒸散发和水分产量的关系，以及气候变化对水分资源的影响。研究表明，生态系统的蒸散发存在一个饱和上限，这使得水分产量对降水变化的敏感性增加。虽然该研究与气候变化有关，但它更侧重于水文过程和生态系统，而不是直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Eyal Rotenberg;Fyodor Tatarinov;Jonathan D. Muller;Dan Yakir
title: Evapotranspiration saturation amplifies climate sensitivity of terrestrial water yield
abstract:
The study shows that evapotranspiration from ecosystems saturates at about 480 mm per year, making water yield—the water available after evapotranspiration—highly sensitive to precipitation changes, amplifying climate impacts on land water resources. 
 Predicted climate change over land indicates decreasing precipitation in many regions and increased flooding in others. Globally, over 60% of land precipitation is consumed by evapotranspiration (ET); the remainder, available as runoff, recharge, and for consumption, is termed water yield (WY). Using a global dataset, we show that ET from ecosystems reaches a ‘saturation’ limit of about 480 ± 210 mm yr⁻¹ across climates and biomes, well below the energy-based limit predicted by the Budyko equation. This inflexibility in ET increases the sensitivity of WY to precipitation variability, implying enhanced vulnerability to flooding in wet regions and an accelerated approach to the limits of ecosystem and societal sustainability in dry regions. Both effects are also supported by model-based projections. WY thus provides a more sensitive and integrative indicator of climate impacts on terrestrial water resources and associated risks for ecosystems and society. The study shows that evapotranspiration from ecosystems saturates at about 480 mm per year, making water yield—the water available after evapotranspiration—highly sensitive to precipitation changes, amplifying climate impacts on land water resources.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用有孔虫的环境DNA和沉积古代DNA来重建相对海平面变化，并与传统的形态学方法进行对比。研究地点位于珠江三角洲的亚热带潮间带环境。虽然该研究与环境科学相关，但它侧重于古环境重建和海平面变化，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接联系。
authors: Zhaojia Liu;Nicole S. Khan;Howard K. Y. Yu;Arthur Chung;Magali Schweizer;Celia Schunter
title: Foraminiferal environmental DNA reveals late Holocene sea-level changes
abstract:
Foraminiferal environmental and sedimentary ancient DNAs provide a complementary approach to traditional morphological methods for relative sea level reconstruction, according to analysis of sediments in the Pearl River Delta. 
 Reconstructing past relative sea level provides critical insight into mechanisms driving sea-level change and informs future projections. Foraminifera are widely used sea-level proxies, but their application is often limited by poor preservation. Here, we demonstrate that foraminiferal environmental DNA and sedimentary ancient DNA provide a complementary approach to traditional morphological methods for relative sea-level reconstruction. By analyzing surface sediments and a core from subtropical intertidal environments in the Pearl River Delta, we found a clear vertical zonation in the environmental DNA assemblage consistent with morphological results. An environmental DNA-based transfer function enabled reconstruction with decadal temporal and decimeter vertical resolution for two periods: 290–1703 CE and 1956–present. Notably, sedimentary DNA preservation extended the reconstruction beyond morphological methods, which was limited by taphonomic processes. The environmental DNA reconstruction closely matched tide-gauge and geological records, underscoring its potential as a robust tool for reconstructing past relative sea level and its driving mechanisms. Foraminiferal environmental and sedimentary ancient DNAs provide a complementary approach to traditional morphological methods for relative sea level reconstruction, according to analysis of sediments in the Pearl River Delta.

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是使用位置信息融合卷积神经网络预测和解释青藏运输通道东部地区的高温热害风险区域。虽然高温与大气环境存在一定关联，但该研究的核心在于地质灾害风险评估，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Zhe Chen;Si Guo;Huadong Guo;Zhengbo Yu;Xiangqi Lei;Qingyun Ji;Ziqiong He;Ruichun Chang;Zhongchang Sun;Xiangjun Pei;Zhongli Zhou;Lorenzo Picco
title: Prediction and interpretation of high-temperature heat damage risk zones in the Eastern Tibetan Transport Corridor based on a location-information-fusion convolution neural network

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是地表反射率的建模，特别是针对沙漠灌木场景。它提出了一种使用核驱动BRDF模型来模拟方向反射率的方法。虽然这与遥感有关，但它更侧重于地表特征的建模，而不是直接的大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Henggang Zhang;Xu Ma;Huaguo Huang;Ziti Jiao;Fei Zhang
title: A method to model the directional reflectance for desert shrub scenes in a general framework of kernel-driven BRDF model

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注中国东北地区北安至黑河公路沿线的多年冻土变形评估。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎侧重于地理学、土木工程或环境科学领域，特别是多年冻土和基础设施的相互作用。
authors: Aoxiang Yan;Shanzhen Li;Xiaoying Jin;Shuai Huang;Wenhui Wang;Jianjun Tang;Anyuan Li;Ze Zhang;Shengrong Zhang;Jinbang Zhai;Lanzhi Lü;Ruixia He;Xiaoying Li;Wei Shan;Ying Guo;Huijun Jin
title: Multi-source assessment of permafrost deformation along the Bei'an–Hei'he highway in Northeast China

explanation: 该论文主要研究南极半岛雪藻爆发的光谱特性和遥感监测，重点在于利用遥感技术识别和分析雪藻的分布和特征。虽然遥感技术本身与大气环境遥感有交叉，但该研究的核心在于生物光学和生态学，而非大气成分、空气质量或大气过程的直接研究。
authors: Barjeece Bashir;Dong Liang;Rong Cai;Faisal Mumtaz;Lingyi Kong;Yahui Zou
title: Corrigendum to “Spectral properties and remote sensing of snow algal blooms in the Antarctic Peninsula” [Remote Sensing of Environment, volume 328 (2025), 114839].

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是利用遥感技术（特别是AVHRR数据）和一种新的自回归算法来检测和分析1983年至2020年间环北极森林的燃烧面积变化。它侧重于森林火灾对地表的影响，而不是直接研究大气环境要素，如空气质量或大气成分。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['burned area', 'circumboreal forests', 'AVHRR', 'autoregressive burned area detection algorithm', 'remote sensing']
authors: Connor W. Stephens;Anthony R. Ives;Volker C. Radeloff
title: Corrigendum to “Substantial increases in burned area in circumboreal forests from 1983 to 2020 captured by the AVHRR record and a new autoregressive burned area detection algorithm” [Remote Sensing of Environment 325(2025) 114789]

explanation: 根据提供的标题，该研究论文主要关注遥感技术在水文应用中的新兴技术。 这意味着它侧重于使用遥感来研究与水相关的过程，例如降水、蒸发、径流、土壤湿度和水资源管理。 虽然大气环境中的某些方面（例如降水）与水文有关，但该论文的重点似乎不在大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）上。 因此，相关性较低。
authors: Jiangyuan Zeng;Di Long;Yongqiang Zhang;Dongryeol Ryu;Jean-Pierre Wigneron;Qi Huang
title: Emerging remote sensing techniques for hydrological applications

explanation: 该研究主要关注森林冠层含水量的原位测量和卫星遥感估算之间的差异。虽然涉及卫星观测，但其重点在于植被遥感，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['Forest canopy water content', 'In situ measurements', 'Satellite-based estimates', 'Remote sensing (vegetation)']
authors: Jasmin Kesselring;Vincent Humphrey;Michael Niederberger;Iris Feigenwinter;Ankit Shekhar;Nina Buchmann;Alexander Damm
title: Divergence between in situ and satellite-based estimates of forest canopy water content

explanation: 由于只提供了标题“Editorial Board”和摘要“Abstract:”，没有提供任何关于研究内容的信息，因此无法判断该论文是否与大气环境遥感技术相关。无法确定其主题词，也无法用中文解释该论文的内容。
title: Editorial Board

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注从点云数据中提取道路空间并将其集成到三维城市模型中。它涉及地理信息学、计算机视觉和城市建模等领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究的重点在于城市基础设施的建模和分析，而不是大气环境的监测和评估。
authors: Elisavet Tsiranidou;Patricia González-Cabaleiro;Antonio Fernández;Lucía Díaz-Vilariño
title: Corrigendum to “A framework for road space extraction from point clouds and integration into 3D city models.” [Int. J. Appl. Earth Obs. Geoinf. 143 (2025) 104803]

explanation: 该研究论文主要探讨了夜间N2O5和NO3的化学反应及其对韩国首尔冬季HNO3的影响。研究通过观测和模型模拟，分析了N2O5的非均相吸收系数，以及非均相水解对HNO3的贡献。研究结果表明，夜间垂直输送对硝酸根自由基的收支平衡有重要影响。虽然该研究没有直接提及卫星观测或特定的遥感技术，但它与大气成分分析和空气质量监测密切相关，因为理解这些化学过程对于准确评估和预测大气污染至关重要。该研究的结果可以用于改进大气化学模型，从而提高基于遥感数据的空气质量评估的准确性。
topic_words: ['Nitrogen oxides', 'N2O5', 'NO3', 'HNO3', 'Aerosol uptake coefficient', 'Heterogeneous hydrolysis', 'Vertical transport', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: Jeonghwan Kim;Jiseon Lee;Chisung Yun;Meehye Lee;Hyunmin Lee;Kwangrae Kim;Hee Sun Lee;Limseok Chang;Gangwoong Lee
title: Nocturnal N<sub>2</sub>O<sub>5</sub> and NO<sub>3</sub> chemistry and its impact on wintertime HNO<sub>3</sub> in Seoul during ASIA-AQ campaign
abstract:
•N2O5(58.7 pptv) and NO3(0.4 pptv) observed near the surface. •Aerosol uptake coefficient of N2O5estimated at 0.021. •Heterogeneous hydrolysis contributed 2.5–5.5 % to HNO3at 28m. •Pre-dawn NO3and N2O5enhanced by a factor of 2–3. •Nocturnal vertical transport influenced the nitrate radical budgets in Seoul. 
 Continuous measurements of dinitrogen pentoxide (N2O5) and nitrate radical (NO3) were conducted at an urban site in Seoul during the ASIA-AQ campaign (February–March 2024). Observed concentrations of N2O5 and NO3 ranged from the detection limit to 1047 and 9.7 pptv, with mean values of 58.7 and 0.4 pptv, respectively. To investigate nocturnal nitrate chemistry, a one-dimensional (1-D) model was applied using in-situ constraints. The model yielded a representative N2O5 uptake coefficient (γN2O5) of 0.021 (95 % confidence interval: 0.015–0.029), indicating significant heterogeneous loss. While the model successfully reproduced the general diurnal variations of key species, it tended to underestimate concentrations of N2O5 and NO3 during pre-dawn hours (01:00 to 04:00 Local Time) under the influence of mountain breezes. Simulations revealed the accumulation of high concentrations of NO3 and N2O5 in the upper residual layer, with heterogeneous N2O5 hydrolysis contributing 10.2–19.5 % of the total column nitric acid (HNO3) production but only 2.5–5.5 % near the surface. Although surface contributions were limited, vertical profiles indicated that this pathway becomes important when NO3 and N2O5 in the residual layer are transported downward. Such downward transport, driven by mountain breezes, enhanced early morning NO3 and N2O5 concentrations by a factor of two to three. These findings highlight the important role of nocturnal vertical transport in nitrate radicals budgets in complex urban areas, including Seoul and other megacities.

explanation: 该研究论文主要探讨了阿拉斯加北极地区冬季PM2.5污染的驱动因素，重点关注本地排放、气象条件（如温度、风向、湿度）以及烟花燃放等因素对PM2.5浓度的影响。研究采用统计模型分析了这些因素与PM2.5超标之间的关系，并探讨了有机碳和黑碳的比例，以识别污染源和大气过程。虽然该研究没有直接涉及遥感技术，但其对大气成分（特别是PM2.5及其组分）的分析与空气质量监测密切相关，并为使用遥感技术进行类似研究提供了基础。
authors: Saravanan Kanagaratnam;Raghu Betha;Kaitlyn M. McKinney;Anastasia Hewitt;Lorena A. Zanandreis;Srijan Aggarwal;Dominique Pride;Sailesh N. Behera
title: Drivers of extreme wintertime <math xmlns:mml="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" altimg="si1.svg" class="math"><mrow><msub><mtext>PM</mtext><mn>2.5</mn></msub></mrow></math> pollution levels in North Pole, Alaska: A generalized ordered logit regression analysis
abstract:
•Local and temperature-driven emissions, along with PBLH influences, drivePM2.5concentrations in the North Pole, AK. •Colder temperatures, low pressure, high RH and AAE, easterly winds, and fireworks drove PM2.5exceedances. •Wide OC/BC ratio variability indicates mixed primary sources and a notable influence of secondary aerosol or aging on PM2.5. 
 North Pole, Alaska, experiences severe wintertime air quality degradation driven by elevated residential biomass burning and persistent meteorological inversions. However, the comprehensive characterization and underlying drivers of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) in this region remain understudied. This study integrates data from four consecutive winter campaigns, combining pollutant measurements and meteorological variables to assess the key drivers of the PM2.5 and its carbonaceous components. Major factors influencing the PM2.5 threshold exceedances were identified using generalized ordered logit regression (GOLR) with an overall accuracy of 67.51 %. Colder temperatures, low absolute pressure, higher relative humidity (RH), elevated Absorption Ångström Exponent (AAE), and zonal component of wind (east to west wind direction), fireworks, and specific temporal patterns (afternoon, evening, and night hours), along with their interactions, were associated with higher PM2.5 levels (>55.4 μg/m3). Mean organic carbon to black carbon ratios (OC/BC) ranged from 8.25 to 10.83 across the four campaigns, consistent with influence from both biomass burning and secondary organic aerosol (SOA) formation. High mean and median OC/BC ratios, strong correlations (R2 = 0.73–0.97) between PM2.5 and total carbon (TC), and weak to strong correlations (R2 = 0.47–0.87) between PM2.5 and black carbon (BC), highlighted source influence and atmospheric processing. The larger variability in OC/BC, ranging from 0.84 to 70.95, indicates the mixing of different primary sources and considerable SOA formation or atmospheric aging. Inter-winter variability in PM2.5 concentrations was primarily driven by local emissions, meteorological conditions including temperature, winds, and planetary boundary layer height (PBLH), and pollutant dispersion patterns, with minimal influence from long-range transport. AAE consistently showed positive associations with elevated PM2.5 levels, indicating biomass burning was an important source during the campaigns.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注乙二醛反应产物在大气中的红外吸收特性，特别是在大气窗口区域（800–1250 cm−1）的吸收。通过计算模拟，研究评估了这些产物对地球辐射的捕获能力，并计算了相对于二氧化碳的相对辐射效率。研究结果表明，乙二醛衍生的产物在红外光谱区域具有显著的吸收特征，可能影响大气热量的捕获，进而影响大气模型，尤其是在城市地区。虽然没有直接提及遥感技术，但其研究结果对于理解大气成分对辐射平衡的影响，以及改进空气质量模型具有重要意义，因此与大气环境遥感技术具有相关性，尤其是在大气成分分析和城市环境空气质量监测方面。
topic_words: ['atmospheric composition', 'radiative balance', 'infrared absorption', 'greenhouse effect', 'air quality modeling', 'urban environment']
authors: Ashish Rana;Priyanshu Meshram;Vernon R. Morris;Jean M. Andino
title: Prediction of the spectral frequencies and relative radiative efficiencies of products from the reactions of glyoxal
abstract:
•Glyoxal reaction products show IR absorption in the atmospheric window ( 800–1250 cm−1). •Relative radiative efficiencies (RREs) compared to CO2were determined. •The RREs suggest potential heat trapping impacts. •These compounds warrant attention in climate modeling of urban radiative balance. 
 Glyoxal-derived nitrogenous organic products are becoming recognized for their role in atmospheric radiative processes. While their absorption in the UV–visible region and their impact on visibility have been extensively studied, their infrared (IR) properties, especially within the atmospheric window region (800–1250 cm−1) remain largely unexplored. This work presents a computational study where the IR vibrational frequencies of compounds generated from glyoxal-ammonium sulfate chemistry and their potential greenhouse impact are calculated. The potential of these chemicals to trap Earth's outgoing radiation within the atmospheric window is assessed by analyzing the calculated frequencies and intensities. The results suggest that the glyoxal-derived products have significant absorption features in the IR spectral region that could potentially influence atmospheric heat trapping. This may impact the output of atmospheric models, particularly in urban areas. A relative radiative efficiency (as compared to CO2) is calculated to attempt to scale the relative importance of these products of glyoxal reaction. This novel perspective underscores the need to account for the IR absorption of oxidation products of the glyoxal-ammonium sulfate chemistry in assessing their full impact on radiative balance.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它使用WRF-Chem模型对巴西两个主要城市地区进行了多年的评估和应用。WRF-Chem模型是一种气象化学模型，常用于模拟和预测大气成分和空气质量。该研究侧重于城市地区，这意味着它可能涉及与城市空气污染相关的特定大气成分的分析。多年评估表明，该研究旨在了解空气质量随时间的变化趋势。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是与空气质量监测和大气成分分析有关。
authors: Daniel Schuch;Yang Zhang;Sergio Ibarra-Espinosa;Maria de Fatima Andrade;Mario Eduardo Gavidia Calderón;Michelle L. Bell
title: Multi-year evaluation and application of the WRF-chem model for two major urban areas in Brazil part II: Multi-Year evaluation and urban-centric analysis

explanation: 由于只提供了标题“Editorial Board”和摘要“Abstract:”，无法判断该研究论文是否与大气环境遥感技术相关。该标题和摘要没有提供任何关于研究主题、方法或结果的信息。因此，无法确定其是否涉及空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术。
title: Editorial Board

explanation: 该论文提出了一种新的日降水偏差校正方法，称为BCFS，该方法结合了空间模式和时间属性，构建了一个统一的降水特征空间。该方法利用卫星观测的降水数据（CHIRPS）和地面观测数据进行融合，以提高降水估计的准确性，尤其是在地面观测站点稀疏的区域。该研究主要关注水文气象应用，如极端降水事件的监测和预报，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、大气成分分析等）的相关性较弱。
authors: Gaoyun Shen;Li Zeng;Lin Fu;Lei Wang;Junann Xiong;Wei Wang
title: An effective gauge-satellite fusion approach for daily precipitation bias correction based on multi-dimensional precipitation feature space (BCFS)
abstract:
•BCFS reduces daily precipitation bias vs. original CHIRPS. •Method outperforms WHU-SGCC, especially for low and high intensity precipitation. •BCFS improves extreme precipitation detection and accuracy in gauge-sparse basins. 
 Accurate high-resolution precipitation data are essential for hydrometeorological research, but existing products often exhibit significant accuracy variations due to sensor characteristics, climatic factors, and complex terrain. Current bias-correction methods have substantial limitations, neglecting spatiotemporal variability and relying on sparse gauge networks. To address these challenges, a novel daily precipitation bias-correction approach called BCFS (based on precipitation feature space construction and gauge–satellite fusion) is proposed. BCFS constructs a unified precipitation feature space by integrating spatial patterns with temporal attributes. BCFS was tested in China's Han River basin (1998–2020) using gauge observations and CHIRPS data, and its performance was compared against uncorrected CHIRPS estimates and the WHU-SGCC method. BCFS reduced relative bias by 74.46 %, 85.49 %, 99.98 %, 98.69 %, 35.78 %, and 27.78 % across precipitation intensities relative to uncorrected CHIRPS. It also outperformed WHU-SGCC, improving accuracy for below-average precipitation and reducing biases at higher intensities. Validation in the Jinsha River basin confirmed regional applicability, demonstrating improved extreme precipitation indices and revealing increasing trends in spring extreme events in the basin's upper reaches. Overall, BCFS effectively captures precipitation spatiotemporal characteristics and overcomes limitations of existing fusion methods, substantially improving daily precipitation estimates in gauge-sparse regions. These improvements provide robust support for hydrometeorological monitoring and extreme-event forecasting.

explanation: 该标题和摘要表明，该研究的重点是西哈萨克斯坦地区的空气污染问题，并采用多源分析方法。虽然这与大气环境有关，但标题和摘要本身并没有明确提及大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，不能断定它与大气环境遥感技术有很强的关联性。
authors: Alexander Ulman;Vitaliy Salnikov;Gulnur Musralinova;Zhanseit Tuimebayev;Svetlana Polyakova;Tamara Tazhibayeva;Azamat Kauazov;Saken Kozhagulov;Daulet Kissebayev;Zhanar Raimbekova
title: Air pollution in the West Kazakhstan region: A multi-source analysis
